subject: Add hero banners, web platforms, and expanded overlay effects
body:
Platforms (14 total, up from 6):
- Website: Hero Standard/Tall/Full HD, OG Image
- Banners: LinkedIn Banner, YouTube Banner
- Other: Email Header, Zoom Background
- Grouped by category in platform selector

Overlays (24 total, up from 11):
- Radial: Radial Soft, Radial Ring
- Effects: Blur Edges, Frame, Duotone
- Blend modes: Multiply, Screen, Overlay, Color Burn
- Textures: Noise, Film Grain (SVG filters)
- Grouped by category in overlay selectors

Technical:
- SVG filters for noise/grain textures
- Blend mode support via mix-blend-mode
- Duotone applies grayscale + color overlay
title: Add hero banners, web platforms, and expanded overlay effects
